What is the structure of the NCC training program?

The NCC training program is structured over three years for senior division cadets (college level) and two years for junior division cadets (school level). The training includes regular parades, camps, courses, and community service activities. Cadets must attend Annual Training Camps (ATCs) and may participate in National Integration Camps (NICs), Leadership Camps, and Republic Day Camps (RDC).
